const.name: trcfile
const.remark: Specifies trace filename: -t [file] (Use relative only if using http service.)

const.name: initfield
const.remark: Activate field initialization: flip all switches twice

const.name: version
const.remark: Shows version info and stops rocrail.

const.name: doc
const.remark: Writes HTML documentation and stops rocrail.

const.name: service
const.remark: Try to start rocrail as Windows Service. (Windows only)

const.name: installservice
const.remark: Try to install rocrail as Windows Service. (Windows only)

const.name: deleteservice
const.remark: Try to uninstall rocrail as Windows Service. (Windows only)

const.name: lcd
const.remark: activate LCD support with gamepad navigation

const.name: initfield
const.remark: Field initialization: flip all switches twice

var.name: accevent
var.remark: To check in the model if it was an accessory event.

var.name: createmodplan
var.remark: Create a modplan if the planfile does not jet exist.

var.name: runasroot
var.remark: Force rocrail to run as root.

var.name: ptiid
var.remark: IID to use with programming; using default in case not set.

var.name: lciid
var.remark: IID to use for mobile decoders; using default in case not set.

var.name: dpiid
var.remark: IID to use for dispathing a loco; using default in case not set.

var.name: sviid
var.remark: IID to use with LN SV programming; using default in case not set.

var.name: poweroffonexit
var.remark: Turn track power off on server exit.

var.name: repeat
var.remark: Repeat interval in ms for the updown axis. (value 0 disables the repeat)

http.remark: Http interface for configure the xspooler.

var.name: port
var.remark: Port number for server socket. Deactivated when 0.

var.name: path
var.remark: Path where to look for external HTML documents.

var.name: port
var.remark: Port number server socket for webclients. Deactivated when 0.

var.name: ysize
var.remark: no height is set when 0 which is recommended

var.name: symbolpath
var.remark: where to look for symbol png's

var.name: webcampath
var.remark: where to look for symbol png's

var.name: webcampos
var.remark: where to locate the cam images

service.remark: Service for remote Rocrail to negotiate about a loc destination.

var.name: sname
var.remark: Servicer name to use in NetReq and NetRsp.

var.name: automatic
var.remark: Trace level for extra info in automatic mode.

var.name: protpath
var.remark: Protocol path; Where to write the trace files. (Use relative only if using http service.) Path is relative to pwd!

var.name: unique
var.remark: Create a unique trace filename at startup.

var.name: nr
var.remark: Number of continuous trace files. In case of 0 or 1: All traces are written in one file disregarding filesize.

var.name: invoke
var.remark: External program or script to invoke on exception file creation.

var.name: invokeasync
var.remark: The invokation will take place in a separate thread.

var.name: listen2all
var.remark: The trace listener will get all traces.

var.name: ctsretry
var.remark: wait for CTS line to come up.

var.name: rtsdisabled
var.remark: Disables RTS line for USB converters. (Depends on type if this is needed.)

var.name: fbmod
var.remark: Number of connected feedback modules of 8 inputs.

var.name: fbpoll
var.remark: Poll sensor events in p50x instead of xEvtSen.

var.name: stress
var.remark: send every 10ms a loconet packet to stress the network

var.name: identdelay
var.remark: Delay before sending a low sensor state for ident codes.

var.name: fastclock
var.remark: send fast clock commands to the connected command station

var.name: ignorebusy
var.remark: ignore the busy message from command station

var.name: fbleft
var.remark: HSI-88 number of modules of 8 inputs on left port

var.name: fbmiddle
var.remark: HSI-88 number of modules of 8 inputs on middle port

var.name: fbright
var.remark: HSI-88 number of modules of 8 inputs on right port

var.name: smooth
var.remark: HSI-88 smooth out fb contact noice; fb must be at least 100ms low before sending event.

var.name: pw4acc
var.remark: Power must be on for accessory commands.

var.name: fastclock
var.remark: Fast clock flag read from SO 2.

var.name: srcpbusGL_ns
var.remark: nmra dcc generic loco with short addr bus

var.name: srcpbusGL_nl
var.remark: nmra dcc generic loco with long addr bus

var.name: shortcutdelay
var.remark: Shortcut events shorter than this time is ignored

var.name: motorolarefresh
var.remark: set to false if no MM locdecoders are used and accessory are MM

var.name: queuecheck
var.remark: Check if there are bytes left in the send queue and sleep.

var.name: fastcvget
var.remark: Fast cv get for real rs232.

var.name: id
var.remark: rocNet sender ID, 1 is default for rocrail.

var.name: fonfof
var.remark: Use the new opcodes for controlling functions.

var.name: loadertime
var.remark: Sleep time between boot loader lines.

const.name: mtyp_canservo
const.remark: 8 servo driver (on canacc8 or similar hardware)

var.name: nrevtvar
var.remark: Number of event variable per event.

var.name: purgetime
var.remark: Idle time for purg a slot.

var.name: shortcutdelay
var.remark: Shortcut events shorter than this time is ignored

var.name: purgetime
var.remark: set to zero if the command station does not purge

var.name: slotping
var.remark: Enable slot ping if purge time is not zero.

var.name: reportaddr
var.remark: global addres on which sensors are reported

var.name: store
var.remark: set by client to signal to store the options in the command station

var.name: purge
var.remark: activate slot purging (purgtime from parent node)

var.name: iid
var.remark: redirect commands to this interface ID

var.name: onlyfirstmaster
var.remark: Only the first client is master.

var.name: initfieldpower
var.remark: Set global power on before init field.

var.name: ignevt
var.remark: Ignore multiple events for the same state if comming within this number of 10ms ticks.

var.name: loccnfg
var.remark: send loco config commands to the CS

var.name: check2in
var.remark: Check for a free new destination between the enter and in event.

var.name: secondnextblock
var.remark: Try to reserve a second next block.

var.name: eventtimeout
var.remark: Time to wait for a next event. Disabled when set to zero.

var.name: signalreset
var.remark: Time to wait for resetting the signals of previous block. Disabled when set to zero.

var.name: routeswtime
var.remark: Time between switch commands in routes.

var.name: disablerouteVreduce
var.remark: Global disable route speed reducing by thrown switches.

var.name: greenaspect
var.remark: Use green aspect instead of yellow if next block has red.

var.name: skipsetsw
var.remark: Skip switch commands in routes for switches already in model position.

var.name: skipsetsg
var.remark: Skip signal commands for signals already in model position.

var.name: semaphorewait
var.remark: Time needed by a semaphore to get in position.

var.name: signalwait
var.remark: Time needed by a signal to set another aspect.

var.name: useident
var.remark: Use bi-directional identifier for set in block.

var.name: poweroffonidentmismatch
var.remark: Power off if the ident code does not match.

var.name: poweroffatghost
var.remark: Power off a ghost is detected when no ghost is accepted.

var.name: keepghost
var.remark: Keep ghost state until manual reset.

var.name: locostartgap
var.remark: Time between signalling loco's to start in auto mode.

var.name: disablesteal
var.remark: Disable throttle to steal loco control.

var.name: blockinitpause
var.remark: Pause between the block init commands.

var.name: allowzerothrottleid
var.remark: Allow broadcasting event coming from zero throttle IDs.

var.name: useblockside
var.remark: Use the defined block sides in the routes to evaluate the running direction.

var.name: stopnonecommuter
var.remark: Stop auto mode for none commuter trains in terminal stations.

var.name: syncroutetimeout
var.remark: Timeout in ms for synchronizing routes.

const.name: fbmods
const.remark: comma separated list of connected feedback module addresses

var.name: modules
var.remark: comma separated list of connected feedback module addresses

bincmd.remark: Binary command; the DigInt should send the bytes un-translated to the command station.

var.name: out
var.remark: one byte represented by 2 ascii chars; StrOp.byteToStr()

var.name: inendbyte
var.remark: Read response until detecting this byte within the inlen.

var.name: data
var.remark: one byte represented by 2 ascii chars; StrOp.byteToStr()

const.name: datarsp
const.remark: data response from previous get command

const.name: mprsp
const.remark: multi port data response from previous get command

const.name: nnreq
const.remark: Node number request for new module with 'modid'.

var.name: acc
var.remark: POM Program On the Main for accessory decoders

var.name: direct
var.remark: Direct mode programming; default is paged.

var.name: decaddr
var.remark: decoder address in case of POM

var.name: modid
var.remark: module id for use with lncv

var.name: id
var.remark: Booster ID; command for all not set.

var.name: id
var.remark: Booster ID; command for all not set.

const.name: hfi
const.remark: Set HF light level for analog systems

const.name: themes
const.remark: Request the themes to use with the plan.

var.name: disablemonitor
var.remark: Client do not want to receive monitor messages embeded in exception wrappers.(iRoc)

var.name: bus
var.remark: Some systems support more than one bus: SLX

item.remark: Message to change type, position and orientation of an item.

var.name: routeids
var.remark: comma separated list of route ids used to show a special route representation

var.name: prev_id
var.remark: in case of an id change this should help to find the original in the table

var.name: cx
var.remark: Zero means not set; use default symbol size.

var.name: generated
var.remark: On the fly generated for an unknown address. Triggered by a client.

modplan.remark: Root node of the module master plan.

var.name: routes
var.remark: File name of route and schedule definitions.

var.name: modified
var.remark: Flags module as modified by the GUI. (Internal use only)

var.name: savemodplan
var.remark: Make sure locs and routes are in separate files and not part of a module!

var.name: savemodules
var.remark: Leave modules un touched if set to false, but all changes are lost.

var.name: modroutes
var.remark: Use internal module routes in conjunction with connections.

var.name: title
var.remark: Text to show in the tab.

var.name: filename
var.remark: File name of module track plan.

var.name: idprefix
var.remark: Add a prefix to all objects to make them unique.

var.name: x
var.remark: x position on an overview panel

var.name: y
var.remark: y position on an overview panel

var.name: id
var.remark: Module ID; for internal use only.

var.name: modid
var.remark: Module ID which connects to this module.

modocc.remark: Root node of the block occupancy.

var.name: placing
var.remark: Loco placing: 0 = Not set, 1 = True, 2 = False

var.name: blockenterside
var.remark: Block enter side: 0 = Not set, 1 = True, 2 = False

var.name: closed
var.remark: Signal this block as closed: Out of order.

var.name: auto
var.remark: The occupying loco is in automode.

var.name: rocguiversion
var.remark: Rocgui version at last save of a local plan.

var.name: rocrailversion
var.remark: Rocrail version at last save of a plan.

var.name: modplan
var.remark: Flags the Rocview if it is assembled from a modular layout definition.

var.name: themes
var.remark: Preferred themes for redndering this plan by Rocviews.

var.name: donkey
var.remark: Flags if a valid donation key is found.

var.name: modviewx
var.remark: x position on an overview panel

var.name: modviewy
var.remark: y position on an overview panel

var.name: modviewcx
var.remark: x size on an overview panel

var.name: modviewcy
var.remark: y size on an overview panel

var.name: scopt_poweroffall
var.remark: Power off all boosters at shortcut.

var.name: scopt_stoplocos
var.remark: Stop all locos in the district at shortcut.

var.name: scopt_repoweron
var.remark: Repower on incase the shortcut is cleared.

var.name: bus
var.remark: Some systems support more than one bus: SLX

var.name: addr2
var.remark: decoder address in case of type 3way

var.name: singlegate
var.remark: Switch works with only one gate.

var.name: delaytime
var.remark: Delay timer for internal use only.

var.name: actdelay
var.remark: if false: delay is programmed in central unit or module

var.name: virtual
var.remark: If this object is only used for dispatching commands.

const.name: right
const.remark: 3way switch right command or right switch type.

const.name: left
const.remark: 3way switch left command or left switch type.

var.name: manualcmd
var.remark: Manual command issued from a client.

const.name: unlocked
const.remark: Place holder for locid not set.

var.name: locid
var.remark: The loc who locked this switch.

var.name: fbOcc
var.remark: Optional feedback for occupancy to block commands.

const.name: accessory
const.remark: Accessory representation, but act like a switch.

var.name: rectcrossing
var.remark: Crossing without motor as rectangular crossing.

var.name: prot
var.remark: Protocol to use for this output.

var.name: ctcbus1
var.remark: Some systems support more than one bus: SLX

var.name: ctcbus2
var.remark: Some systems support more than one bus: SLX

var.name: ctcbusled1
var.remark: Some systems support more than one bus: SLX

var.name: ctcportled1
var.remark: port of decoder module: 0 = not used.

var.name: ctcbusled2
var.remark: Some systems support more than one bus: SLX

var.name: ctcportled2
var.remark: port of decoder module: 0 = not used.

var.name: delay
var.remark: Seconds to elaps to go back to the closed position.

var.name: lockroutes
var.range: Routes to lock at open, and unlock at close.

var.name: manual
var.remark: operator controlled signal to influence auto mode

var.name: bus
var.remark: Some systems support more than one bus: SLX

var.name: pair
var.remark: both gates are used for on-off

var.name: asswitch
var.remark: send a switch command incase of 2 aspects

var.name: prot
var.remark: Protocol to use for this output.

var.name: grpid
var.remark: Group ID; All buttons of this group must be true to trigger actions.

var.name: bus
var.remark: Some systems support more than one bus: SLX

var.name: port
var.remark: port of decoder module: 0 = not used.

var.name: inv
var.remark: Output as switch inverted. (Software wiring correction)

var.name: prot
var.remark: Protocol to use for this output.

var.name: svgtype
var.remark: Defines which SVG symbol should be used in case of show.

var.name: bus
var.remark: Some systems support more than one bus: SLX

var.name: ctcbus
var.remark: Some systems support more than one bus: SLX

var.name: ctcport
var.remark: port of decoder module: 0 = not used.

var.name: countedcars
var.remark: number of cars to count before firing the event. (only for client info)

var.name: fbtype
var.remark: feedback type reported by the device

var.name: minocc
var.remark: minimal tracks to be occupied before leaving the fiddle yard

var.name: type
var.remark: how the schedule should be used

var.name: cycles
var.remark: number of runs in case of cycle type: 0 is just one run

var.name: timeframe
var.remark: time frame for accepting a delay

var.name: free2go
var.remark: Block or location must be free before the schedule can start.

var.name: swap
var.remark: swap the loc placing before traveling to this destination

var.name: managerid
var.remark: ID of the manager object like FY or TT.

var.name: len
var.remark: Distance between enter and in event to check with train length.

var.name: evttimer
var.remark: event timer; loc should wait this time before processing the event

var.name: evttimer2
var.remark: event timer reverse direction; loc should wait this time before processing the event

var.name: forceblocktimer
var.remark: Force the block event timer to overrule the optional loco event timer.

var.name: acceptghost
var.remark: accept a ghosttrain and signal the block occupied.

var.name: terminalstation
var.remark: swap placing of an incomming loc to get another default direction.(terminal station)

var.name: allowchgdir
var.remark: Allow using a route in the opposite running direction.

var.name: smallsymbol
var.remark: Show this block with the small representation.

var.name: remote
var.remark: This flag is set by the R2Rnet object.

var.name: rrid
var.remark: This id is set by the R2Rnet object.

var.name: mvdistance
var.remark: Distance between the enter and in event.

var.name: extstop
var.remark: An external stop module will take over the throttle. Use only with enter2in! (Lenz ABC.)

var.name: updateenterside
var.remark: For internal use only: Event for updating the loco block enter side only.

const.name: closed
const.remark: In this state the block is not chooseable for locs.

var.name: locid
var.remark: The loc which is actualy in the block or is comming or going.

var.name: manual
var.remark: Block not chooseable for locs in auto-mode if set to true.

var.name: wait
var.remark: Should the loc wait in this block?

const.name: wait_fixed
const.remark: Wait a fixed period of time.

const.name: wait_loc
const.remark: Takes the loc wait time as defined in lc.

var.name: waittime
var.remark: Wait time in case of wait_fixed.

var.name: minwaittime
var.remark: Min. wait time in case of wait_random.

var.name: maxwaittime
var.remark: Max. wait time in case of wait_random.

var.name: stopspeed
var.remark: Block speed on arrive and stop.

var.name: maxkmh
var.remark: Block max. speed in km/h or mph.

var.name: signalR
var.remark: Home Signal ID for reverse direction. (sw)

var.name: wsignalR
var.remark: Warning Signal ID for reverse direction. (sw)

var.name: electrified
var.remark: Block is open for electric locs.

var.name: station
var.remark: Block has a station defined by type.

var.name: turnoutstolock
var.remark: comma separated list of turnouts to lock with the block

var.name: typeperm
var.remark: Only allow this type of trains.

var.name: endpuls
var.remark: use the down flank of the puls

var.name: from
var.remark: from block id (csv list for more blocks)

var.name: byroute
var.remark: Comming from block x by route y. (optional)

var.name: remote
var.remark: This flag is set by the R2Rnet object.

var.name: rrid
var.remark: This id is set by the R2Rnet object.

var.name: locid
var.remark: The loc which is actualy in the block or is comming or going.

link.remark: in case of critsect the src is ignored and all blocks listed in dst are group members

const.name: usage_critsect
const.remark: group is used as a critical section

var.name: allowfollowup
var.remark: Allow follow up in critsec for the same direction.

var.name: active
var.remark: Activates links: all blocks are set to manual mode.

var.name: dst
var.remark: destination blocks; id's in CSV format

var.name: free
var.remark: One of this blocks must be free. (csv)

st.remark: A street defines a destination fromone block to another including switch positions.

var.name: modid
var.remark: module ID for internal use only

const.name: routelock
const.remark: id to signal FY and TT a route lock/unlock

var.name: bka
var.remark: From block ID: $ prefix is a NetRocrail ID.

var.name: bkb
var.remark: To block ID: $ prefix is a NetRocrail ID.

var.name: bkc
var.remark: Crossing block: optional incase a block overlaps turnouts used by this route. This is a csv list of blocks.

var.name: dir
var.remark: Direction permission; true is from-to only, false is both directions.

var.name: lcdir
var.remark: Loco running direction from-to; true is forwards, false is backwards.

var.name: swap
var.remark: swap loco placing at activating this route

var.name: swappost
var.remark: swap loco placing at terminating this route

var.name: crossingblocksignals
var.remark: Set the signals in the crossing blocks according to the from block.

var.name: locid
var.remark: The loco which has locked this route.

const.name: cmd_track
const.remark: track of turntable or selectiontable: avoid using same id's for both types!

var.name: lock
var.remark: lock the switch for exclusive use

const.name: go
const.remark: Switch all switches for this street.

const.name: test
const.remark: Switch all switches for this street without sending the clients updates.

var.name: speed
var.remark: Route speed on departure; overwrites block departure speed if set.

var.name: typeperm
var.remark: Only allow this type of trains.

var.name: maxlen
var.remark: Maximal train length allowed for this route.

var.name: countcars
var.remark: Count number of cars before firing events.

var.name: ctcbus1
var.remark: Some systems support more than one bus: SLX

var.name: ctcbus2
var.remark: Some systems support more than one bus: SLX

var.name: ctcbus3
var.remark: Some systems support more than one bus: SLX

var.name: allowschedules
var.remark: Allow schedules to use this route.

var.name: bus
var.remark: Some systems support more than one bus: SLX

var.name: motoroffdelay
var.remark: shut off delay for locdec motor

var.name: psen
var.remark: ID of the position ready sensor

var.name: manager
var.remark: Manager mode: Act like a block and manage all sub blocks.(Tracks)

var.name: swcmd
var.remark: use switch instead of output commands

const.name: accdec
const.remark: Controlling a modified turntable with switch commands.

var.name: actfn
var.remark: Activation function for locdec type turntable drives.

var.name: s1
var.remark: Feedback ID for detection occupancy on the bridge.

var.name: s2
var.remark: Feedback ID for detection occupancy on the bridge.

var.name: sMid
var.remark: Feedback ID for detection occupancy on the bridge.

var.name: sMid2
var.remark: Feedback ID for detection occupancy on the bridge.

const.name: unlocked
const.remark: Place holder for locid not set.

var.name: locid
var.remark: The loc who locked this turntable.

var.name: pause
var.remark: pause between direction and position command

var.name: posfb
var.remark: Feedback ID for positioning the TT.

var.name: oppositetrack
var.remark: Opposite track to do a 180 degree turn.

var.name: polarization
var.remark: Flip bridge polarization when entering this track.

var.name: image
var.remark: local image file to show in dialogs

var.name: shortid
var.remark: Short IDs are used for throttle displays.

var.name: useshortid
var.remark: Use short ID to send to throttle.

var.name: throttleid
var.remark: Throttle ID to which this loco is dispatched.

var.name: throttlenr
var.remark: Throttle number for receiving the short id.

var.name: identifier
var.remark: Loc identifier incase of RFID, Lissy, Barcode...

var.name: prev_id
var.remark: in case of an id change this should help to find the original in the loc table

var.name: bus
var.remark: Some systems support more than one bus: SLX

var.name: port
var.remark: Block number in the Dinamo system. (Block property)

var.name: len
var.remark: Total length of loc with wagons to check with block length..

var.name: nrcars
var.remark: Number of cars. Needed for counting in sensors.

var.name: secondnextblock
var.remark: Try to reserve a second next block.

var.name: resumeauto
var.remark: Resume auto mode from previous session.

var.name: shortin
var.remark: Use shortin event to stop in blocks.

var.name: inatpre2in
var.remark: Use pre2in event to stop in blocks.

const.name: V_mode_percent
const.remark: use 30 incase of mins=4, 70 incase of maxs=10... (Replaces attr controlled)

var.name: V_mode
var.remark: How the V values should be interpreted by the digint: percent is used for decoders without max speed tuning.(Delta...)

var.name: V_raw
var.remark: Loc speed in CS speed steps.

var.name: V_rawMax
var.remark: Max loc speed in CS speed steps.

var.name: V_step
var.remark: Time between next decoder speed.(used only incase of V_mode_percent)

var.name: mass
var.remark: Mass index for use with Dinamo.

var.name: placing
var.remark: If loc is placed back to front this should be set to false.

var.name: roaming
var.remark: The roaming flag allows a loc traveling to other systems.

var.name: trysamedir
var.remark: Try find new destinations in the same direction as the loc is running now.

var.name: tryoppositedir
var.remark: Try find new destinations in the opposite direction. (to-from)

var.name: forcesamedir
var.remark: Force find new destinations in the same direction as the loc is running now.

var.name: dirpause
var.remark: pause after sending last turnout command and before sending the direction to the loc decoder

var.name: priority
var.remark: train priority used for multiplying the wait time if no destination is found

var.name: prot
var.remark: P = protocol by server, M = Marklin, N = NMRA-DCC, L = NMRA-DCC long addresses, A = Analog, C= Car Decoder

var.name: fx
var.remark: Function status bits for display only.

var.name: active
var.remark: Active for running in auto mode.

var.name: sw
var.remark: Change direction in P50 protocol.(Use dir=true/false)

const.name: stop
const.remark: Stop loc in next or current block.

const.name: deactivate
const.remark: Prevent loco from being started in auto mode.

const.name: activate
const.remark: Allow loco being started in auto mode.

const.name: block
const.remark: Set loc in the supplied block.

const.name: release
const.remark: Release loco from throttle: The releasing throttle must provide the throttleid.

const.name: reset
const.remark: Stop immidiately and go to idle mode.

const.name: shortid
const.remark: Send the short ID to the command station.

var.name: evttimer
var.remark: event timer; loc should wait this time before processing the event

var.name: ent2incorr
var.remark: Correction percentage for enter2in block timer

var.name: swaptimer
var.remark: Swap placing timer; Loco should wait this time before processing the swap.

var.name: consist_lightsoff
var.remark: Keep lights turned off for all slave locos.

var.name: consistcmd
var.remark: Consist context command; Flag for preventing loops.

var.name: image
var.remark: image file to show in dialogs

var.name: subtype
var.remark: Car sub type like Boxcar or gondola.

var.name: waybills
var.remark: Option for freight cars; where to go and what to load.

var.name: text
var.remark: Text or Image (if ending on .png) to be displayed.

var.name: prev_id
var.remark: in case of an id change this should help to find the original in the table

var.name: type
var.remark: type [ext] is an external program or script to be executed

var.name: activate
var.remark: action activation at state ON or OFF: default is ON(true)

var.name: timer
var.remark: Timer in ms before activation this action.

var.name: cmd
var.remark: on, off or an external program or script to be executed

var.name: param
var.remark: command parameter like schedule id for lc

var.name: refid
var.remark: Reference ID for getting more information for this action.

var.name: bus
var.remark: Some systems support more than one bus: SLX

var.name: sharedfb
var.remark: Use one set of sensors for all blocks.

var.name: manager
var.remark: Manager mode: Act like a block and manage all sub blocks.(Tracks)

var.name: minocc
var.remark: minimal tracks to be occupied before leaving the fiddle yard

var.name: movedelay
var.remark: delay in seconds after an IN event before processing a new move

var.name: prot
var.remark: protocol to use for this seltab

var.name: psen
var.remark: ID of the position ready sensor

var.name: s1id
var.remark: sensor 1 id for optical feedback of the selected position

var.name: s2id
var.remark: sensor 2 id for optical feedback of the selected position

var.name: bus
var.remark: Some systems support more than one bus: SLX

var.name: prot
var.remark: protocol to use for this seltab

var.name: psen
var.remark: ID of the position ready sensor
